text:
Nimbl3 | www.nimbl3.com | Onsite only | Bangkok, Thailand | Visa sponsorship | Relocation assistance

Hiring Full stack developer that has:

- Solid experience in Ruby / Ruby on Rails.

- Strong Javascript / Jquery / JS frameworks (any: Ember, Angular, Backbone, React) CSS / SASS or LESS.

- Experience Linux/DevOPS (highly desirable).

- 3+ years of experience.

More details at https://careers.stackoverflow.com/jobs/98461/full-stack-ruby...

Reach us at work@nimbl3.com
